screen module¶

screen.load_stock_list()¶

read from blotter.xlsx, which contains [at a minimum] the following fields: “SYMBOL”, “SHARES”, “UNITARY”, “BROKER”, “EXIT_TARGET”

Returns

Array of current holdings

Return type

Pandas dataframe

screen.lookup(stock: str)¶

INDIVIDUAL STOCK INFO LOOKUP

Parameters

stock (str) – STOCK TICKER SYMBOL

screen.main(output: str)¶

CORE FUNCTIONALITY OF APP: 1. LOADs SYMBOLS FROM FILE INTO DATAFRAME 2. CALLS MULTI-THREADED LOOKUPS (API TO FINVIZ) & ADDS TO RESULTS DATAFRAME 3. BOTH DATAFRAMES ARE RECONCILED (GROUPED ON STOCK SYMBOL) INTO mergeDf 4. ROI (RETURN ON INVESTMENT) IS CALCULATED AND DATA FORMATTED BY COLUMN 5. VARIOUS WORKSHEETS SAVED INTO CONSOLIDATED EXCEL FILE:

-raw_data -analysts (FROM API CALL) -analysis (INTERNAL CALCS BASED ON PORTFOLIO) -portfolio (DETAILED NAV (NET ASSET VALUE) STOCK HOLDINGS BY SECTOR) -portfolio_breakdown (AGGREGATED HOLDINGS BY SECTOR WITH PERCENTAGE)

Parameters

output (str) – DESTINATION PATH AND FILE

Stock Portfolio Roboadvisor
